DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study measure overall level satisfaction patient cutaneous surgery 4 different category , include surgeon , facility , procedure recovery outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective identify factor associate patient satisfaction level determine correlation patient satisfaction surgeon clinical perception .
DOC.criteria: 1880 year old Is selfreported stable health condition English speaking Is willing ability understand study , provide informed consent communicate investigator Recommended schedule cutaneous surgery Agrees followup schedule time Unable speak read English Did complete 8th grade education A history mental illness Any disability condition would prevent completion questionnaire
